name: RG Brands - Daily AI News Translation & Summary with GPT-4 and Telegram Delivery

parameters.content:
🛠️ Setup Instructions (RG Brands AI Digest Bot)
1. API Keys
NewsAPI & GNews:
Register on NewsAPI.org and GNews.io to get your API keys.
Add your NewsAPI and GNews API keys to the corresponding fetch nodes in the workflow.

2. Telegram Bot
Create a bot via @BotFather in Telegram.

Copy the token, add it to your n8n Telegram credentials.

In the Telegram send node, use the chat ID of the person or group who will receive the digest.
Tip: To send to all who started the bot, you’ll need a chat ID list or user management (expandable in the future).

3. OpenAI/Perplexity API
Create a credential for your preferred LLM (GPT/OpenAI or Perplexity API).

Assign this credential in the summarizer node.

🔄 Workflow Logic
Scheduled Trigger:
Fires daily at 08:00 (adjust as needed).

Fetch News:
Gets the latest articles on AI from both NewsAPI and GNews.

Merge & Standardize:
Articles from both sources are merged into a unified list.

AI Summarization:
The LLM (GPT or Perplexity) receives a focused prompt to:

Select the most relevant tools, launches, or critical news for business use.

Summarize, critique, and translate for Russian-speaking business/project managers.

Format output as a readable Telegram post, with links and clear headlines.

Send to Telegram:
The formatted digest is sent to the desired chat(s).

🧑‍💼 Customization & Notes
Change News Focus:
Adjust keywords in the fetch nodes to focus on tools, automation, or your company’s niche.

Prompt Engineering:
Update the prompt in the AI summarizer for more/less technical language, industry focus, or to add company-specific tips.

Recipient Management:
To scale, add chat ID collection logic so all who message the bot get digests.

Language & Style:
Refine the AI summarizer’s instructions for a friendlier, more formal, or more technical tone as needed.

Delivery Time:
Change the scheduled trigger node to set a different delivery hour.

Archiving:
(Optional) Add storage (Google Sheets, Notion, etc.) for past digests.

⚡️ Purpose
This workflow delivers practical, business-focused AI news and tool reviews directly to RG Brands project teams, helping them keep up with relevant innovations and critical analysis for AI adoption in enterprise contexts.
All content is automatically curated, summarized, and translated for easy consumption in Telegram.

### Data Source Nodes
- `Fetch GNews articles` and `Fetch NewsAPI articles` get up to 20 latest AI-related English news each from two different APIs using your API keys.
- Both sources are standardized to an `articles` property for merging.

parameters.text:
=You are an expert AI news analyst and assistant. Your audience is a project team at RG Brands, interested in new AI tools, enterprise solutions, automation, and critical perspectives on AI adoption for business efficiency.

**Your tasks:**
1. From {{$json.articles}}, select the 10–15 most practically valuable and up-to-date articles focused on:
   - Launches or updates of new AI tools and platforms relevant to business and automation.
   - Case studies or real-world applications of AI in enterprises.
   - Critical analysis or expert reviews of AI tools, especially their practical benefits and limitations.
   - Key industry news about AI adoption and innovation in corporate environments.
2. For each selected article, create a short digest including:
   - A brief, clear summary (2–4 sentences) explaining what the tool or solution is, how it works, and what problem it solves for business or automation.
   - Practical relevance and potential value for enterprise use (if possible).
   - Concise critical insight (advantages, risks, limitations, or expert commentary) if mentioned in the source.
   - The article’s source link.
   - (Optional, if useful) Keep the original English tool name/brand as a citation in parentheses.
3. Translate your summary into professional Russian, suitable for business/project managers, but do **not** translate standard technical terms or well-known tool names. If explanation is needed for a technical term, add a short parenthetical note.
4. Begin your output with today’s date and a headline in Russian, e.g.:  
   `{{ $now.format('yyyy/MM/dd') }}  — Дайджест новых инструментов и критики AI для бизнеса`
5. Output a single well-formatted digest, convenient for Telegram:  
   - Use a numbered or bulleted list for articles.
   - Each item: brief headline (with tool name), 2–4 sentence summary (Russian), then source link.
   - Group together articles about the same tool/platform if relevant.
   - Avoid entertainment/news with little business value.

**Focus:** Only select news that can actually help or inspire business/project managers to use AI more efficiently in enterprise workflow or decision-making. Omit pure research, hype, or general “fun facts”.

Output only the finished digest. No meta-comments.

---

**Русский перевод для внутреннего понимания:**
— Бот должен готовить краткую, полезную сводку новостей и инструментов AI, фокусируясь на практической пользе и критическом разборе для бизнеса, в формате статьи-поста с удобочитаемым оформлением и ссылками на источники.**

---

### Пример (старт промпта для AI узла):

> You are an expert AI news analyst and assistant. Your audience is a project team at RG Brands, interested in new AI tools, enterprise solutions, automation, and critical perspectives on AI adoption for business efficiency.
>
> 1. From {{$json.articles}}, select the 10–15 most practically valuable and up-to-date articles focused on:  
>    – Launches or updates of new AI tools and platforms relevant to business and automation  
>    – Case studies or real-world applications of AI in enterprises  
>    – Critical analysis or expert reviews of AI tools, especially their practical benefits and limitations  
>    – Key industry news about AI adoption and innovation in corporate environments
> 2. For each article, create a short digest including:  
>    – Summary (2–4 sentences) explaining the tool, solution, and business value  
>    – Critical insight or limitations (if available)  
>    – Source link  
>    – Original English tool/brand name as a citation (if useful)
> 3. Translate your summary into professional Russian, do not translate technical terms or famous tool names.
> 4. Begin with today’s date: `{{ $now.format('yyyy/MM/dd') }}  — Дайджест новых инструментов и критики AI для бизнеса`
> 5. Output as a formatted digest for Telegram (numbered list, readable post, with sources). Group similar news.
> 6. Focus only on actionable, useful business/enterprise content.
> Output only the digest.

parameters.content:
### AI Assistant Logic
The summarization uses the latest GPT-4.1 model to select, translate, and enrich the top 15 AI news links from both GNews and NewsAPI. Controlled by a tailored prompt for concise, readable output.
